title: Free Alistar?
body: So me and my friend (igns JMaster007 and AJ2Play) heard about a way to get Alistar and an Alistar skin for free but can't seem to find a way to get him. Help?

replies.body:
If it's free it's me!!!

To get the free Alistar and Unchained Alistar skin, all you need to do is follow [**this link**](http://woobox.com/eqfand). Subscribe to the official Youtube channel on that site, and make sure to enter your Summoner Name and that should do the trick. If that doesn't work for some reason, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can get that fixed right up!
Where would one go if you play on the EUW server?
